title: BC Route Planner
description:
Finds shortest/fastest route between a start point and one or more stop points on British Columbia's public road network. Here are some geocoded addresses to play with:
18 Douglas St,Victoria -123.36962,48.40892
1002 Johnson St, Victoria -123.355745,48.426206
543 Johnson St, Victoria, BC -123.36907,48.42770
14 Centennial Sq, Victoria, BC -123.36564,48.42863
1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster -122.92009,49.20063
808 Jackson Cres, New Westminster -122.90762,49.22558
10810 McDonald Rd, Chilliwack -121.93808,49.19859
3950 June Springs Rd, Kelowna -119.40751,49.83960
1201 Riondel Rd, Kootenay Bay -116.85402,49.74448
1201 Riondel Rd, Kootenay Bay -116.832759,49.730500 (parcelPoint)
2499 Walbran Pl, Courtenay -124.97295,49.71518
2013 Smoke Bluff Rd, Squamish -123.13946,49.70401
235 Kelvin Grove Way, Lions Bay -123.23524,49.45035.
Please see our data collection notice

actions.title: directions.outputFormat.get
actions.description: Represents the turn-by-turn directions, geometry, distance, and time of the shortest path or fastest path between given start and end points

points.description: Example: -123.70794,48.77869,-123.53785,48.38200. A list of any number of route points in start to end order. See points

outputSRS.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. See outputSRS

criteria.description: Routing criteria to optimize (e.g., shortest, fastest). Default is shortest.

distanceUnit.description: distance unit of measure (e.g., km, mi). Default is km.

routeDescription.description: Route description (e.g., Shortest route from 1002 Johnson St, Victoria to 1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster)

actions.title: distance.outputFormat.get
actions.description: Represents the distance and time of the shortest or fastest path between given start and end points.

points.description: Example: -123.70794,48.77869,-123.53785,48.38200. A list of any number of route points in start to end order. See points

outputSRS.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. See outputSRS

criteria.description: Routing criteria to optimize (e.g., shortest, fastest). Default is shortest.

distanceUnit.description: distance unit of measure (e.g., km, mi). Default is km.

routeDescription.description: Route description (e.g., Shortest route from 1002 Johnson St, Victoria to 1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster)

actions.title: distance.betweenPairs.outputFormat.get
actions.description: Represents the distance and time of the shortest or fastest paths between all pairs of fromPoints and toPoints. The number of fromPoints times the number of toPoints should not exceed 100 or the request will time out.

fromPoints.description: Example: -123.70794,48.77869,-123.53785,48.38200. A comma-separated list of origin points. See fromPoints

toPoints.description: Example: -124.972951,49.715181,-123.139464,49.704015. A comma-separated list of destination points. See toPoints

outputSRS.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. See outputSRS

criteria.description: Routing criteria to optimize (e.g., shortest, fastest). Default is shortest.

distanceUnit.description: distance unit of measure (e.g., km, mi). Default is km.

routeDescription.description: Route description (e.g., Shortest route from 1002 Johnson St, Victoria to 1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster)

actions.title: route.outputFormat.get
actions.description: Represents the geometry, distance, and time of the shortest or fastest path between given start and end points.

points.description: Example: -123.70794,48.77869,-123.53785,48.38200. A list of any number of route points in start to end order. See points

outputSRS.description: The EPSG code of the spatial reference system (SRS) to use for output geometries. See outputSRS

criteria.description: Routing criteria to optimize (e.g., shortest, fastest). Default is shortest.

distanceUnit.description: distance unit of measure (e.g., km, mi). Default is km.

routeDescription.description: Route description (e.g., Shortest route from 1002 Johnson St, Victoria to 1105 Royal Ave,New Westminster)
